channel.title: Can't run my client & server, Help?
channel.description:
Any time i try to run a client i get [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And when i try to run my server i get [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Pretty much the same thing, Anyone care to help?

item.title: Can't run my client & server, Help?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

ii will try my best, after ts done installing then it should work, just make sure your paths are correct. I am on vacatiion so i probably wont be able to go on much

Read full topic

@G_scape wrote:

I know what the problem is.

Try this

@echo off
color 0a
title (Your server name)
“C:/Progra~1/Java/jdk1.6.0_10/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m server

Not sure if it will work but its worth a try…

item.source: Can't run my client & server, Help?

item.title: Can't run my client & server, Help?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The problem is you java path is messed up try doing the open your server file than right click on run and press edit it should look something like this

@echo off color 0a title (Your server name) "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_10/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server

and where it says jdk 1.6.0_10 change it to whatever jdk version you have so if you have update 6 for instance than put jdk1.6.0_6 it should be the same for your client i hope this helped

Read full topic
